    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAll(User loggedInUser)
        Returns All the Companies in the Database. ADMIN, DIRECTOR, MANAGER: Can get ALL the Users. ELSE: UNAUTHORIZED
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The user who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the list of the Companies.

      • getById

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getById(User loggedInUser,
                                                       Integer id)
        Returns the Company with the requested ID. ADMIN, DIRECTOR, MANAGER: Can get any the Users. ELSE: UNAUTHORIZED Non existing Company: NOTFOUND
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The user logged in
        id - The ID of the Company the user wants to GET
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of the Company.

      • getCompanyOfLoggedInUser

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getCompanyOfLoggedInUser(User loggedInUser)
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the Company the User works at. ADMIN, DIRECTOR, MANAGER: Can get the Company. ELSE: UNAUTHORIZED
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The user logged in
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the Company the User works at.

      • putById

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity putById(Company companyToUpdate,
                                                       User loggedInUser,
                                                       Integer id)
        Updates the Company by ID. ADMIN: Can save any of the Company. DIRECTOR: Only can update its Company, else: FORBIDDEN ELSE: UNAUTHORIZED Non existing Company: NOTFOUND
        Parameters:
        companyToUpdate - The Company with the information to update.
        loggedInUser - The user logged in.
        id - The ID of the Company the user wants to PUT (Update).
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of the updated Company.

      • addCompany

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addCompany(Company companyToSave,
                                                          User loggedInUser)
        Creates a new record of Company. ADMIN: The only User who can register a company ELSE: UNAUTHORIZED
        Parameters:
        companyToSave - The Company with the information to save.
        loggedInUser - The user logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of the saved Company.

      • deleteById

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteById(Integer id,
                                                          User loggedInUser)
        Deletes a Company record by ID. ADMIN: The only User who can delete a company. ELSE: UNAUTHORIZED Non existing History: NOTFOUND
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Company the user wants to DELETE.
        loggedInUser - The user logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity: OK if the deletion was successful and NotFound if the record was not found.
